trans-unit.source: Handles <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> subelements that do not have specific implementations or handlers registered on the machine.
trans-unit.target: 處理<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>並沒有特定實作或電腦上註冊的處理常式的子元素。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> subelements with specific implementations are <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoName>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>具有特定實作的子元素是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoName>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data>。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoX509Data> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoRetrievalMethod> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `<KeyInfo>` element, see Section 4.4 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML Encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`<KeyInfo>`項目，請參閱區段 4.4 XMLDSIG 規格中，可用於在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ w3c，或，請參閱 XML 加密規格，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> class with content taken from the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>取自指定的內容類別<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An XML element from which to take the content used to create the new instance of <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 從其中取得用來建立的新執行個體內容的 XML 項目<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> returned by this method is suitable for use as a subelement of an XMLDSIG or an XML encryption `<KeyInfo>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>傳回由此方法適合用來做為子元素 XMLDSIG 或 XML 加密的使用`<KeyInfo>`項目。</xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>

trans-unit.source: Parses the input <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> and configures the internal state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref> to match.
trans-unit.target: 剖析輸入<xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref>及設定的內部狀態<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>要比對。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlElement"></xref> that specifies the state of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
Gets or sets the XML content of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 內容的目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The XML content of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfoNode"></xref>.
